TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageFormatConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 是一个类，可用于将 对象从一种数据类型转换为另一种数据类型。

span.span: is a class that can be used to convert objects from one data type to another.

summary.span: 通过 对象访问此类。

span.span: Access this class through the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型转换器用于转换数据类型之间的值。A type converter is used to convert values between data types. 类型转换器还支持在设计时属性配置，通过提供文本值的转换或用户可以从选择的值的列表。A type converter also supports property configuration at design time by providing text-to-value conversion or a list of values that users can select from. 访问类通过类通过调用方法。Access the class through the class by calling the method. 与已知的图像格式，在中指定进行转换类。The converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the class. > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要转换图像格式，如 BMP 和 JPEG，之间进行转换之间使用之一采用的方法对象作为参数。If you want to convert between image formats, such as converting between BMP and JPEG, use one of the methods that takes an object as a parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public ImageFormatConverter ();

Public Sub New ()
public: ImageFormatConverter();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要创建直接对象。Do not create a object directly. 访问类通过类通过调用方法。Access the class through the class by calling the method.

span.span: Indicates whether this converter can convert an object in the specified source type to the native type of the converter.

returns.span: 如果此对象可以执行转换，则此方法返回 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与已知的图像格式，在中指定进行转换类。The converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与已知的图像格式，在中指定进行转换类。The converts to and from known image formats, as specified in the class. 最常见的类型转换为字符串类型。The most common type conversion is to and from a string type. 默认实现调用对象方法的对象是否有效且目标类型为`string`。The default implementation calls the method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is `string`. 如果此方法无法将指定的对象转换为指定的目标类型，它将引发异常。If this method cannot convert the specified object to the specified destination type, it throws a exception.

span.span: The conversion cannot be completed.
is
